医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
肌酸和阻力训练可对抗肌肉减少症将肌酸补充剂与阻力训练相结合，可以增强老年人的肌肉力量、瘦体重和认知健康，为预防肌肉减少症提供安全有效的策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Creatine-and-resistance-workouts-combat-sarcopenia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Creatine-and-resistance-workouts-combat-sarcopenia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4ca17880-aa77-42de-820f-c011089720e2 Wed, 04 Dec 2024 23:17:00 -0500 Creatine and resistance workouts combat sarcopenia
肠道微生物组和大脑进化：能量分配的新见解大脑较大的灵长类动物的肠道微生物群促进了大脑功能的葡萄糖产生和能量分配，揭示了进化中的代谢策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Gut-microbiome-and-brain-evolution-New-insights-into-energy-allocation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Gut-microbiome-and-brain-evolution-New-insights-into-energy-allocation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=21912f2f-ec73-4bd3-8f42-a5b82cfb4183 Wed, 04 Dec 2024 22:41:00 -0500 Gut microbiome and brain evolution: New insights into energy allocation
酮体 β-羟基丁酸恢复蛋白质平衡并针对阿尔茨海默病相关聚集物科学家们发现β-羟基丁酸是蛋白质溶解度的关键调节剂，为对抗衰老和阿尔茨海默病中的神经退行性疾病提供了一种新途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Ketone-body-ceb2-Hydroxybutyrate-restores- Protein-balance-and-targets-Alzheimere28099s-linked-aggregates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Ketone-body-ceb2-Hydroxybutyrate-restores- Protein-balance-and-targets-Alzheimere28099s-linked-aggregates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cb19dc5e-6863-4ba3-9f73-81bf72e2e50d Wed, 04 Dec 2024 22:22:00 -0500 Ketone body β-hydroxybutyrate restores protein balance and targets Alzheimer’s-linked aggregates
阿尔茨海默病遗传风险研究因系统性偏差而受到破坏《自然遗传学》最近的研究揭示了使用阿尔茨海默病父母史的 GWAX 研究中普遍存在的偏差，强调了遗传关联和疾病风险预测中潜在的误导。一种新颖的 GSUB 方法可以识别源自生存偏差和社会经济地位等混杂因素的错误信号。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Alzheimers-genic-risk-studies-undermined-by-systemic-biases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Alzheimers-genic-risk-studies-undermined-by-systemic-biases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=538f22a2-c9db-48cd-acb6-874736a9665b Wed, 04 Dec 2024 21:49:00 -0500 Alzheimer's genetic risk studies undermined by systemic biases
草甘膦暴露与持久的脑部炎症有关人类大脑是一个适应性极强的器官，即使遭受严重创伤也通常能够自我治愈。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Glyphosate-exposure-linked-to- permanent-brain-inflammation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Glyphosate-exposure-linked-to- permanent-brain-inflammation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bdf0bcd1-051f-44aa-86f0-ca5df76ce1f1 Wed, 04 Dec 2024 21:48:53 -0500 Glyphosate exposure linked to lasting brain inflammation
国家儿童基金会和 FDA 签署为期五年的儿科设备创新合作协议为了帮助促进儿科健康，国家儿童医院和美国食品和药物管理局 (FDA) 设备和放射健康中心 (CDRH) 科学与工程实验室办公室 (OSEL) 签署了一项为期五年的研究协议，以帮助促进儿科健康开发监管科学工具（RST）的合作协议，旨在协助儿科和围产期医疗器械的技术评估。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Childrens-National-and-FDA-sign- Five-year-collaboration-for-pediatric-device-innovation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Childrens-National-and-FDA-sign- Five-year-collaboration-for-pediatric-device-innovation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b87da18a-67b3-4bc5-ad70-1ed1ae96ec75 Wed, 04 Dec 2024 21:40:17 -0500 Children's National and FDA sign five-year collaboration for pediatric device innovation
ACMG 制定了管理苯丙氨酸羟化酶缺乏症的新终身指南更新了苯丙氨酸羟化酶缺乏症诊断和管理的循证临床指南。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/ACMG-sets-new-lifelong-guidelines-for-managing-苯丙氨酸-羟化酶-deficiency.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/ACMG-sets-new-lifelong-guidelines-for-managing-苯丙氨酸-羟化酶-deficiency.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=877cb476-d9fb-4406-b8ea-78b356e89f95 Wed, 04 Dec 2024 21:38:00 -0500 ACMG sets new lifelong guidelines for managing phenylalanine hydroxylase deficiency
免疫细胞在运动控制和代谢平衡中发挥关键作用哥本哈根大学和伦敦帝国理工学院的研究人员在《自然》杂志上发表的一项开创性研究得出结论，免疫细胞在控制运动以及将神经活动与代谢需求联系起来方面发挥着令人惊讶且关键的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Immune-cells-play-a-key-role-in-movement-control-and-metabolic-balance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Immune-cells-play-a-key-role-in-movement-control-and-metabolic-balance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bd7ab1fe-a02c-4093-825c-33492ff3c538 Wed, 04 Dec 2024 21:36:30 -0500 Immune cells play a key role in movement control and metabolic balance
不孕女性患系统性自身免疫性疾病的风险较高与没有生育问题的女性相比，经历过不孕症但未接受生育治疗的女性在自然受孕后的九年内罹患系统性自身免疫性风湿病 (SARD) 的风险更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Women-with-infertility-have-higher-risk-of-developmenting-systemic-autoimmune-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Women-with-infertility-have-higher-risk-of-developmenting-systemic-autoimmune-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=784d471c-ea89-432a-b937-e4ecf2ecfb23 Wed, 04 Dec 2024 21:23:37 -0500 Women with infertility have higher risk of developing systemic autoimmune diseases
了解慢性炎症的新方法可能会带来更好的癌症治疗韦恩州立大学最近发表的一项关于了解慢性炎症的新方法的研究可能会导致包括癌症在内的许多衰弱性疾病的治疗取得新进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/New-approach-to-understanding-chronic-inflammation-could-lead-to-better-cancer-therapies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/New-approach-to-understanding-chronic-inflammation-could-lead-to-better-cancer-therapies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4d74ad53-e47e-4b30-ad92-a21b9626f731 Wed, 04 Dec 2024 21:15:04 -0500 New approach to understanding chronic inflammation could lead to better cancer therapies
